Method Detail

getLocalHostAddresses

public static InetAddress[] getLocalHostAddresses()
                                           throws UnknownHostException
Returns a sorted list of all local addresses of this machine. The list is sorted as follows:
  • Global Addresses
  • Site local Addresses
  • Link local Addresses
  • Loopback addresses
If a global, site or link local address is present the loopback address is ommited from the result.

Returns:
a sorted list of all local addresses of this machine.
Throws:
UnknownHostException - in case no address could be found.

getLocalHostAddress

public static InetAddress getLocalHostAddress()
                                       throws UnknownHostException
Returns the "most public" InetAddress of this machine.

Returns:
the "most public" InetAddress of this machine.
Throws:
UnknownHostException - in case no address could be found.
